# If you want to prevent 'make clean' from deleting the files generated by this macro
# (this is specially useful if you add the generated files to the version control repository), 
# add the following command:  
# SET_DIRECTORY_PROPERTIES(PROPERTIES CLEAN_NO_CUSTOM true)

OPENCOG_ADD_ATOM_TYPES(atom_types.script
	atom_types.h
	atom_types.definitions
	atom_types.inheritance
	bioscience_types.scm
        bioscience_types.pyx
)
ADD_CUSTOM_TARGET(bioscience_atom_types DEPENDS atom_types.h)

# In the CMakeLists.txt for a module (library or executable) that
# depends on the atom types defined by this library, you must add a
# dependency to this target, as follows:
# ADD_DEPENDENCIES(lib_or_exec_name example_atom_types)

# The atom_types.h file is written to the build directory
INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR})

ADD_LIBRARY (bioscience-types SHARED
	atom_types
	BioScienceTypes
)

# This module depends on the base opencog atom types.
ADD_DEPENDENCIES(bioscience-types opencog_atom_types)
ADD_DEPENDENCIES(bioscience-types bioscience_atom_types)

INSTALL (FILES
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/atom_types.h
	DESTINATION "include/${PROJECT_NAME}/bioscience/types"
)
